title: Theresa May – 2017 Statement on the UK Leaving the EU
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, in the House of Commons on 9 October 2017.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
